flawed_nl_solution:
The land will be divided into 1 (Jose) + 4 siblings = <<1+4=5>>5 pieces.
So, Jose will have 20000/5 = <<20000/5=400.0>>400.0 square meters of land.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4000.0, not 400.0. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
